Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at The Imperial Hotel in London (London City Centre), you'll be minutes from Russell Square and The British Museum. This hotel is close to St. Paul's Cathedral and London Eye.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 448 air-conditioned guestrooms. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones and irons/ironing boards, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of The Imperial Hotel.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, a 24-hour front desk, and laundry facilities.


Pets allowed
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of The Imperial Hotel.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
Special cancellation policies or charges may apply for group reservations (more than 8 rooms for the same property / stay dates).

Make yourself at home in one of the 448 air-conditioned guestrooms. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones and irons/ironing boards, and housekeeping is provided daily.

With a stay at The Imperial Hotel in London (London City Centre), you'll be minutes from Russell Square and The British Museum. This hotel is close to St. Paul's Cathedral and London Eye.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Russell Square - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
The British Museum - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
St George’s, Bloomsbury - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
University of London - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
British Library - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Royal Opera House - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Covent Garden Market - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
BT Tower - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
King's College London - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Leicester Square - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
London Coliseum - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
London Palladium Theatre - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
St. Martin-in-the-Fields - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
National Gallery - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Trafalgar Square - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 12.2 km / 7.6 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 23.3 km / 14.5 mi
London (LGW-Gatwick) - 40.8 km / 25.3 mi
London (LTN-Luton) - 43.4 km / 26.9 mi
London (STN-Stansted) - 48.8 km / 30.3 mi

The preferred airport for The Imperial Hotel is London (LHR-Heathrow).

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
Special cancellation policies or charges may apply for group reservations (more than 8 rooms for the same property / stay dates).
